sub_topic: Solving systems of linear equations with complex coefficients
message_1:
Solve the system of linear equations with complex coefficients:

3x + 2y + iz = 5 + 4i

2x - y - 4iz = -3 - 4i

4x + 3y + (1 + i)z = 7 - i
message_2:
To solve this system of linear equations with complex coefficients, we can use the method of substitution or elimination. In this case, we will use the elimination method.

First, let's rewrite the given system of equations:

(1) 3x + 2y + iz = 5 + 4i
(2) 2x - y - 4iz = -3 - 4i
(3) 4x + 3y + (1 + i)z = 7 - i

We will eliminate x from equations (2) and (3). To do this, we will multiply equation (2) by 2 and equation (3) by -1:

(2') 4x - 2y - 8iz = -6 - 8i
(3') -4x - 3y - (1 + i)z = -7 + i

Now, we will add equations (2') and (3'):

(-5y - 7iz) = -13 - 7i
(4) y = (13 + 7i)/5 + (7/5)iz

Now, we will eliminate x from equations (1) and (3). To do this, we will multiply equation (1) by -4/3 and equation (3) by 3:

(1') -4x - 8/3y - (4/3)iz = -20/3 - 16i/3
(3'') 12x + 9y + 3(1 + i)z = 21 - 3i

Now, we will add equations (1') and (3''):

(5) y + (5/3 + 3i)z = 1 - 5i/3

Now, we have two equations for y:

(4) y = (13 + 7i)/5 + (7/5)iz
(5) y = 1 - 5i/3 - (5/3 + 3i)z

We will equate the right-hand sides of equations (4) and (5):

(13 + 7i)/5 + (7/5)iz = 1 - 5i/3 - (5/3 + 3i)z

Now, we will solve for z:

(7/5)iz + (5/3 + 3i)z = (8 - 12i)/15
z(7i/5 + 5/3 + 3i) = (8 - 12i)/15
z = (8 - 12i)/15 / (7i/5 + 5/3 + 3i)
z = (8 - 12i) / (21 + 51i)
z = (8 - 12i)(21 - 51i) / (21^2 + 51^2)
z = (1008 + 420 - 648i - 102i^2) / (441 + 2601)
z = (1008 + 420 + 648i + 102) / 3042
z = (1530 + 648i) / 3042
z = (255 + 108i) / 507
z = 1/3 + 2i/3

Now, we will substitute z back into equation (4) to find y:

y = (13 + 7i)/5 + (7/5)i(1/3 + 2i/3)
y = (13 + 7i)/5 + (7i/5)(1/3) + (7i/5)(2i/3)
y = (13/5 + 7i/5) + (7i/15) + (14i^2/15)
y = (13/5 + 7i/5) + (7i/15) - (14/15)
y = (13 - 14 + 7i + 7i)/15
y = (-1 + 14i)/15
y = -1/15 + 14i/15

Now, we will substitute y and z back into equation (1) to find x:

3x + 2(-1/15 + 14i/15) + i(1/3 + 2i/3) = 5 + 4i
3x - 2/15 + 28i/15 + 1/3i - 2/3 = 5 + 4i
3x = 5 + 4i + 2/15 - 28i/15 - 1/3i + 2/3
3x = 5 + 4i + 2/15 - 28i/15 - 5i/15 + 10/15
3x = 5 + 4i - 26i/15 + 12/15
3x = 5 + 4i - 26i/15 + 4/5
x = (5/3) + (4 - 26/15)i
x = (5/3) + (46/15)i

So, the solution to the system of linear equations with complex coefficients is:

x = (5/3) + (46/15)i
y = -1/15 + 14i/15
z = 1/3 + 2i/3
